name: TmeZombie: Zombie Survival Shooter
description:
Try to survive until the time is up. Can you do it? The game currently has 2 levels.

Currently there is only 1 level. Other levels will be added soon. It is a prototype to see if the game will become popular or not. Therefore, there are not so often updates.

Control info is included in the game about Setting.

The 2nd level is only available to you with an Android smartphone.

Genre: Zombie Survival Shooter. (LowPoly).

Compatible: PC Windwos, Smartphone Android.

Language: English.

It is an indie game and was developed by one person. Name of the game developer and owner of the company Green Woltec. Sascha Marco Wolf.
